To register, or get overseas voting information for your state, go to http://VoteFromAbroad.org.

We post daily.

Life is a preposterous horror.

Money speaks for money, the devil for his own
Who comes to speak for the skin and the bone?

The law locks up the man or woman
Who steals the goose off the common
But leaves the greater villain loose
Who steals the common from the goose.

Retired software engineer living in Virginia, USA, happily married, wildlife photography (mostly birds) is my main hobby. I support democracy and embrace diversity. I believe it is essential we teach honest history - the glorious & good as well as the ugly & evil. All photos mine except reposts
